title: "Microsoft 'positioned the best' to drive AI adoption"
text: "As Microsoft (MSFT) broadens its AI reach through partnerships like OpenAI while advancing in-house offerings such as Copilot
source_name: Macquarie's Head of AI & Software Research Fred Havemeyer joins Yahoo Finance Live to discuss why he sees Microsoft shares as undervalued given its generative AI potential. Havemeyer believes the revenue and profit opportunities for Microsoft in this space are significant."

title: "Apple to pause some Apple Watch sales after intellectual property dispute"
text: "The decision stems from an intellectual property disagreement between Apple and Masimo over the Blood Oxygen feature."

title: "Amazon Nails Down Partnership With Warhammer Creator"
text: "Amazon has agreed to develop movies and TV series based on the Warhammer 40
date: the British company that makes the miniature tabletop game series
topics: announced the agreement on its website Monday (Dec. 18)."
